verbs.description: [ARG1: perfectly rectangular iceberg] [V: spotted] [ARG0: by nasa] [ARGM-LOC: in the antarctic] is an object of geometric perfection a remarkable rectangular iceberg with sharp edges and a smooth surface looks as if it were deliberately cut by a machine but nasa scientists say it a product of mother nature national climate assessment lockheed martin space systems u s government scientist kelly brunt larsen c live science antarctic lockheed iceberg delaware west antarctica west antarctic ice sheet nasa bryan coasts weddell antarctic peninsula
